sources.title: Tank Battalion
sources.description: Title: Tank Battalion Summary: Four men in their tank, during the Korean War in 1951, find themselves behind enemy lines. Directed by: Sherman A. Rose Actors: Production Company: Iron Foxhole Inc. Release Date: July 1958 (USA) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG Four men in their tank, during the Korean War in 1951, find themselves behind enemy lines.

metadata.Plot: Four men in their tank, during the Korean War in 1951, find themselves behind enemy lines.
metadata.Actors: Don Kelly, Leslie Parrish, Edward G. Robinson Jr.
